name: Rogue (itch) (videogamejesus)
description:
A tiny top down shooter roguelike made for the 7DRL game jam hosted on itch.io!

Music credits (awesome beats!) :

Plus @ Free Music Archive (tracks 'Albert' and 'Evacuation')
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Plus/

029 @ Free Music Archive (tracks 'Unknown Orchestra' and 'Intro')
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Cronicool_aka_029/
